sentences.en: Ari Hart recently received the accolade of being represented in the Museum of Modern Art.
sentences.cn: 阿里·哈特的作品最近有幸获选在现代艺术馆展出。

sentences.en: Chief Hart had sole control over that fund.
sentences.cn: 哈特主任独自掌控那笔资金。

sentences.en: Debbie Hart is going to swim across the English Channel tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 黛比.哈特准备明天横渡英吉利海峡.

sentences.en: Erna Hart is going to swim across the English Channel tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 欧娜.哈特准备明天游泳横渡英吉利海峡.

sentences.en: God Almighty, Hart, you scared me silly.
sentences.cn: 哎呀，哈特，你把我都吓傻了！

sentences.en: Hart actually'knew some - thing of the old West.
sentences.cn: 他确实了解西部早期拓荒生活的一些情况.

sentences.en: Hart cried out as his head struck rock.
sentences.cn: 哈特的头撞到石头上，疼得他大叫起来。

sentences.en: Hart stared at Byron and shook his head in a tired way.
sentences.cn: 哈特盯着拜伦看,不耐烦地摇了摇头.

sentences.en: music and lyrics by Rodgers and Hart
sentences.cn: 由罗杰斯和哈特作词作曲

sentences.en: She tugged on Hart's arm to extricate him from the circle of men with whom he'd been talking.
sentences.cn: 她拽着哈特的胳膊，把他从那群正和他聊天的男人中拖了出来。

sentences.en: That he could not hart a child or anything helpless.
sentences.cn: 他不忍心伤害儿童或其他软弱无力的人或动物.

sentences.en: These chilling heroines make Hart's books compulsive reading.
sentences.cn: 这些令人毛骨悚然的女主人公使哈特的书读起来让人爱不释手。

sentences.en: Vic Seixas and Doris Hart won the mixed doubles.
sentences.cn: 维克·塞克萨斯和多丽丝·哈特赢得了混合双打冠军。

sentences.en: You seem to have coursed the hare and captured the hart.
sentences.cn: 你似乎追了一阵兔子,却抓到了公鹿.
